title: A sustainable method for oxidizing phenanthrene in tropical soil using natural iron as a catalyst in a slurry phase reactor with persulfate assistance
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00328D, Paper
Mohammad Qutob, Mohd Rafatullah, Syahidah Akmal Muhammad, Masoom Raza Siddiqui, Mahboob Alam
Active radicals play a major role in the oxidation process and SO4˙− is more dominant than O2˙−, while HO˙ plays a minor role.
